We noticed that you had raised a query with us regarding the RPG form. Our team has already shared a response, but as we havenâ€™t received a reply from your end, we will now be closing this request, trusting that your concern has been resolved.

If you need further clarification or have any additional queries, please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to us at alumni@masaischool.com. We are always committed to assisting you whenever required.

parameters.subject: Masai - RPG - Final Reminder - Action Required
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $json['Student Name'] }},

As discussed during our initial call, you were informed about the 7-day deadline for completing the re-entry steps.

Our support is based on your intent and effort. At this point, we are observing a lack of initiative from your side, which makes it difficult for us to continue providing assistance.

That said, we are giving you an additional 4 days to complete the re-entry steps. If you are unable to do so within this timeframe, we will be unable to continue offering Alumni Benefit support.

After updating your Resume, Portfolio, and GitHub profiles, kindly follow the steps mentioned in the following document:

RPG Clearance Document

Once you have worked on the feedback provided by the team, please submit your updated RPG links using this form:

Submit Updated RPG Links

Please treat this as a final reminder and take the necessary action within the given timeframe.

Warm Regards,
Masai School

This is an automated email. Please do not reply to this message.
